settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: Plant-based is the way forward, but it’s time to set the bar higher. No more fillers, gums, or additives. Elmhurst is dedicated to making plant milks the way they’re meant to be - with the simplest ingredients and by maximizing their nutrition. Plant milks that actually taste like what they’re made from and do what they promise by using more of the nuts and grains you want and none of what you don’t. It’s Simpler. Better.

settings.title: Become a Subscriber
settings.text: Now you can have your favorite Elmhurst® products automatically shipped to your door as often as you want and enjoy 10% OFF EVERY ORDER.  To sweeten the deal for being an Elmhurst VIP, we'll take $5 off shipping for each delivery too!

settings.text: Our pantry-friendly cartons don't need to be refrigerated until opened.

settings.title: Oat Latte Flash Brew™
settings.text:
A precise flash-brewing method unlocks the best flavor of Arabica beans in an oat milk latte.

Shelf-stable: no refrigeration needed until opened
Once opened, refrigerate and consume within 7-10 days
30g whole grain per serving (Whole Grains Council stamped)
No added gums or emulsifiersVegan, dairy-free
Vegan, dairy-free
Carrageenan-free, gluten-free
No artificial flavors
Non-GMO Project verifiedKosher
Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ method

settings.title:
PRESERVES THE
NUTRITIONAL INTEGRITY
settings.text: Using just water, The HydroRelease® Method preserves the integrity of fats, proteins and fibers from the source ingredient. No chemicals. No over-processing.

settings.title:
CREAMY TEXTURE,
SIMPLE INGREDIENTS
settings.text: The nutritional components are recombined to create a thick, creamy full-flavored beverage without added gums, fillers or preservatives. The ingredient list couldn't be simpler.

settings.title:
UNMATCHED
NUTRIENT DENSITY
settings.text: With more of the nutrition preserved, Elmhurst® products are more concentrated with bioavailable nutrition - making them easier for your body to digest and absorb.

settings.title: Vanilla Soft Serve
settings.text:
The best dairy-free frozen desserts start with the finest oat milk. Elmhurst® Unsweetened Oat Milk has one of the cleanest labels around. The cherry on top? No dairy, no gums, no gluten, no artificial anything.

Ingredients: Oatmilk (Filtered Water, Whole Grain Oats), Chickpea Milk (Filtered Water, Chickpea), Cane Sugar, Canola Oil, Coconut Oil, Natural Flavors, Sunflower Lecithin, Himalayan Pink Salt

Still have questions? Check out these Ice Cream FAQs

•Great Taste! Smooth, fresh-churned texture
•Made with the finest quality
•Elmhurst® Oat Milk - crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ method
•Works in any home ice-cream maker – Only 3 easy steps!
•100% Dairy-Free, Vegan
•Non-GMO Project verified
•No artificial flavors
•Gluten-free
•No gums or stabilizers
•Carrageenan-free
•Kosher

•Customize to your heart’s desire

settings.title: Oat Latte Variety Pack
settings.text:
Coffee or tea? Get the best of both with our Latte Variety pack, featuring our Matcha & Flash Brew Oat Lattes made with your favorite Elmhurst Oat Milk. With as much caffeine as a cup of coffee, 30g whole grain, and zero added gums or fillers - you’ll get a natural energy boost that keeps you feeling full & focused. Each pack includes: 
6 Matcha Oat Lattes 
6 Flash Brew Oat Lattes 

•Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days 
•Excellent source of ALA Omega-3s, 5g of Protein, and 30g of Whole Grain 
•Zero Added Gums, Oils, or Artificial Flavors & Carrageenan-Free 
•Certified Gluten-Free, Made with Purity Protocol Grown Oats 
•Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, and OU Kosher 
•Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ method

settings.title: Oat Milk Variety Pack
settings.text:
Add a little flavor to your routine and take your oat milk favorites with you with this variety pack of Blueberry & Chocolate Single-Serve Oat Milks. With 30g whole grain, up to 75% less sugar than dairy chocolate milk, and zero added gums or fillers – they’re the perfect snack or lunch box addition to enjoy wherever the day takes you. Each pack includes: 
6 Blueberry Single-Serve Oat Milks 
6 Chocolate Single-Serve Oat Milks 

•Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days 
•Made with 6 Simple Ingredients or Less 
•Zero Added Gums, Oils, or Artificial Flavors & Carrageenan-Free 
•Certified Gluten-Free, Made with Purity Protocol Grown Oats 
•Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, and OU Kosher 
•Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ method

settings.title: Ultimate On-The-Go Variety Pack
settings.text:
Get all your on-the-go favorites in one perfect pack, featuring our single-serve Oat Milks and Oat Lattes. Made with your favorite Elmhurst Oat Milk, each delivers 30g of whole grain & upto 5g protein to keep you feeling full and your energy up. All with zero added gums, oils, or fillers and a fraction of the sugar. Each pack includes: 
3x Blueberry Single-Serve Oat Milks 
3x Chocolate Single-Serve Oat Milks 
3x Matcha Oat Lattes

settings.title: Pistachio Crème Oat Creamer
settings.text:
Buttery, smooth and nutty, with a touch of sweetness – add a splash of decadence to your cup with our Pistachio Crème Oat Creamer. Made with simple ingredients, we found the perfect blend of oats, pistachios, and hemp so it’s velvety and rich without any added gums or oils. And with just 15 calories and 1g of added sugar per serving you can indulge in every sip! 

• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days 
• Certified Gluten-Free, Made with Purity Protocol Grown 100% Whole Grain Oats 
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Carrageenan Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher  
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard 
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: Pumpkin Spice Oat Creamer
settings.text:
If fall were a flavor, it would be Pumpkin Spice. So we combined all those warm, cozy flavors you love with the simplest ingredients to get this limited-edition Pumpkin Spice Oat Creamer just right.  It’s smooth and creamy, with just 1g added sugar per serving and zero added gums or oils.  Now you can enjoy a taste of fall in your cup all season long! 

• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days  
• Certified Gluten-Free, Made with Purity Protocol Grown 100% Whole Grain Oats 
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Carrageenan Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher  
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard 
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: Caramel Macchiato Oat Creamer
settings.text:
Bring this coffee shop favorite home with our Caramel Macchiato Oat Creamer. We blended rich, buttery caramel with our oat milk and hemp cream for the perfect balance of sweet and creamy. And with just 1g added sugar per serving and zero fillers or gums, now you can treat yourself every morning with your new favorite creamer! 

• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days  
• Certified Gluten-Free, Made with Purity Protocol Grown 100% Whole Grain Oats 
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Carrageenan Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher  
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard 
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: PISTACHIO BARISTA EDITION
settings.text:
Our Pistachio Barista Edition was made for coffee. Crafted with the help of baristas and only using the simplest ingredients, we’ve bottled the elegance of pistachios to complement any coffee roast. Rich and buttery, with a touch of sweetness, for a perfectly creamy and indulgent cup without added gums or oils.  

• Froth hot or cold, steam for lattes & the most intricate of art, or top off your cup 
• Made with Raw Pistachios – 3g Protein per serving
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Certified Gluten-Free, Carrageenan Free
• Non-GMO Project Verified & OU Kosher
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: OatNog
settings.text:
Meet the plant-based nog that’ll have you in the holiday spirit from the very first sip. We blended cozy spices with whole grain oats and cashews to make an Oatnog so decadent and creamy you’ll forget it’s dairy-free. Enjoy this holiday classic on its own or try it in your coffee and recipes! Made with only the simplest ingredients, now you don’t have to miss out on anything this season. 

• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days 
•Rich & Creamy Blend of Whole Grain Oats and Cashews  
•6 Simple Ingredients - Zero Added Gums, Oils, or Fillers 
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Carrageenan Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher  
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard 
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: The Cozy-Season Essentials Pack
settings.text: The Cozy-Season Essentials Pack has everything you need to stay cozy this season. Pumpkin Spice Oat Creamer is the easiest way to enjoy the fall fav at home– enjoy in hot or iced coffee to add warm, decadent flavor and a touch of sweetness with just 1g sugar per serving. And for the holidays we’ve got our fan-favorite OatNog™– this blend of whole grain oats, buttery cashews and festive spices is so smooth and creamy you won’t believe it’s dairy-free. Like everything Elmhurst, these seasonal treats are made with only the simplest ingredients, never added junk.

settings.title: The Entertainer Variety Pack
settings.text:
Featuring our limited edition Oatnog and Pistachio Barista Edition, it’s the perfect pack to celebrate this season. Make any breakfast or brunch extra-special with Pistachio Lattes, or finish the night cozied up the classic way with a glass of nog on its own or paired with your favorite spirit! This pack includes: 
-3x Oatnog 
-3x Pistachio Barista Edition 

• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days 
• 6 Simple Ingredients - Zero Added Gums, Oils, or Fillers 
• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Certified Gluten-Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher  
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard 
• Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.title: Image with text
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: Plant-based is the way forward, but it’s time to set the bar higher. No more fillers, gums, or additives. Elmhurst is dedicated to making plant milks the way they’re meant to be - with the simplest ingredients and by maximizing their nutrition. Plant milks that actually taste like what they’re made from and do what they promise by using more of the nuts and grains you want and none of what you don’t. It’s Simpler. Better.

settings.title: Variety Pack Barista Edition
settings.text:
Find your latte's plant-based match with our Barista Variety Pack - featuring our Barista Edition Oat, Almond, and Pistachio Milks and Barista Approved Cashew Milk. This special set of plant milks was made for coffee, using only the simplest ingredients and zero added gums or oils. Froth hot or cold, steam for a velvety latte or cappuccino, or add a splash to top off your morning cup!Each Pack Includes:

Barista Pistachio x1
Barista Edition Oat Milk x1
Barista Edition Almond Milk x1
Barista Approved – Milked Cashews x1

settings.title: Treat Yourself Bundle
settings.text:
Treat yourself to this specially curated bundle of the world’s finest plant milks. Our Unsweetened Cashew Milk will make any dish or dessertextracreamy with good fats that support heart health. And to give smoothies and shakes the ultimate upgrade, we’ve got an Unsweetened Almond that has 5g of protein in every glass. Both with just 2 simple, easy-to-love ingredients. Each pack includes:

Unsweetened Almond x2
Unsweetened Cashew x2

settings.text:
Warm, inviting notes of real maple and toasty walnuts make this barista-approved plant milk the perfect complement to your coffee routine. Steam for lattes, froth hot or cold, or use as a creamer to add a touch of decadence to any roast or blend without added junk.

  • Simply Sweetened with Real Maple Syrup
  • Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO, Gluten Free & OU Kosher
  • 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard
  • Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

settings.text:
Our brightly flavored blend of creamy oat milk, buttery cashews and sweet lavender is the simplest way to upgrade all your favorite iced drinks with vibrant botanicals. Sip it straight, froth hot or cold, or spike it with your choice of liquor to craft the ultimate spring-summer cocktail.

settings.title: The New Coffee Essentials Pack
settings.text:
Awaken your inner barista with this specially curated bundle of our newest made-for-coffee creations. Our Limited-Edition Vanilla Lavender Botanical Blend is the simplest way to upgrade your favorite iced drinks with vibrant botanicals. And our warm, inviting Maple Walnut Barista froths into a velvety foam for the perfect latte. Simply crafted with real maple syrup and lavender extract, not the sugary syrups you’ll find at most coffee shops. This pack includes:

  • *NEW* Vanilla Lavender Botanical Blend x1
  • *NEW* Maple Walnut Barista Edition x1

Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ method & packed in a 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC Certified paperboard.

settings.title: Unsweetened Plant Milk Variety Pack
settings.text:
From buttery cashew milk to smooth & creamy oat milk, our Unsweetened Variety Pack has so many unique plant milks, you're bound to find a new favorite. We only use the simplest, most wholesome ingredients to craft each deliciously creamy variety. With more nuts and grains in every sip, there's no room for added oils, gums or fillers.     

      1x *NEW* Unsweetened Coconut Cashew Milk
     1x Unsweetened Almond Milk
     1x Unsweetened Cashew Milk
     1x Unsweetened Oat Milk
     1x Unsweetened Walnut Milk
     1x Unsweetened Hazelnut Milk

• Dairy-Free, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Carrageenan Free, Non-GMO Project Verified, OU Kosher
• Shelf-stable until opened. After opening, refrigerate and enjoy within 7-10 days
• 100% Recyclable Carton made from FSC-Certified paperboard
• Crafted with out patented HydroRelease™ method

settings.title: Dairy Free Sour Cream
settings.text:
As a former NYC dairy, we have high standards for how smooth & creamy plant-based alternatives should be. So after perfecting plant milks with only the simplest ingredients, we set out to craft the world’s finest plant-based Sour Cream. You won’t believe how rich and tangy our recipe is – and like everything Elmhurst, it’s free from added junk. Squeeze a little or a lot to enjoy as a topping or in your favorite recipes without the mess.

  • Zero Sodium or Cholesterol
  • Dairy-Free, Vegan, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free & OU Kosher
  • 100% BPA-Free Pouch
  • Crafted with our patented HydroRelease™ Method

Please note: Your sour cream will NOT arrive chilled. Don’t worry – it doesn’t have to be refrigerated until after opening. It’s best served chilled though, so pop it in the fridge before enjoying for the first time.
